text: Pál Ványa (13 January 1904 - 5 October 1967) was a Hungarian ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Hungarian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Hungary Category:Ski jumpers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:People from Veľký Krtíš District
title: Pál Ványa
